content: this legal text discusses the division of assets among coowners the properties involved are two apartments in ancona and a dwelling in numana the parties agree to terminate the existing state of coownership and form a common mass with four shares the specific shares and values assigned to each party are outlined the total value of the common mass is stated and the rights and values assigned to each party are calculated the overall balance owed to each party is determined and the parties agree to settle the balances accordingly the text concludes with a statement of discharge and waiver of potential legal mortgage
